strapiPost.title: Early Voting For The 2022 General Election Begins Today
strapiPost.content:
Early voting for the Arkansas General Election, school elections, and court election starts today, giving citizens over two weeks to cast their ballot before Election Day on Nov 8. 

  • Where to go: Look up your voter registration online HERE for a list of locations available for you to vote from. 
  • What to know: Download this 2022 Arkansas Ballot Issue Voter Guide to know what will be on the ballot and what your vote for or against will mean. 

Find other helpful voter resources HERE.
